snippet.title: NBA 2K13 Dynasty Edition (Xbox 360)
snippet.description: NBA 2K13 redefines what it means to improve upon a sports game year over year.

snippet.title: Running Dead
snippet.description: If you want to try a running game that's a little different from the rest in the genre, Running Dead is a good option, but be ready to grind through levels to make money for new weapons.

snippet.title: 3D-printed bio-shoes could repair themselves
snippet.description: It doesn't take long for avid runners to wear down a new pair of shoes. But some day runners and walkers alike may be able to pop protocell shoes into a vat of liquid to regenerate overnight.

snippet.title: Let your shoes do the charging
snippet.description: Rice University mechanical engineering students hope their PediPower shoes can one day power pacemakers, artificial hearts, and more.

snippet.title: Wendy Davis' filibuster shoes praised in Amazon reviews
snippet.description: What's one way abortion-rights supporters can laud the lawmaker who blocked an anti-abortion bill? With amusing online reviews of her shoes, of course: "I am so glad that I have a choice about what shoes to buy."

snippet.title: Spiked 3D-printed running shoes put a spring in your step
snippet.description: A designer 3D-prints spiky customized running shoes that may help improve an athlete's performance on the track.

snippet.title: Sneaker Speaker: Put on your dancing shoes
snippet.description: Your funky shoes are about to get high-tech if the Sneaker Speaker wearable speaker/shoe combination is actually a real product.

snippet.title: Barefoot running app may require shoes
snippet.description: Oxymoronic Barefoot shoes may help you run barefoot with this app.

snippet.title: Running for office? Target your Victory
snippet.description: Need help raising funds for a political cause? Victory Events will help fill your campaign chest.

snippet.title: Temple Run Oz
snippet.description: Anyone who likes endless runners or who has enjoyed Temple Run games in the past should check out this game for the new worlds, obstacles, and mini-games.
